data.title: Mike Myers Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Mike Myers on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Mike Myers including Shrek 2, Shrek the Third, and more.
data.text:
The SNL 40th Anniversary Special

Comedy's biggest stars will return to Studio 8H for one night only and pay tribute to the series' incredible 40 year history, featuring appearances by past hosts, cast members, and musical legends.

Amy Adams/One Direction

Sketches include Sam Smith / Dr. Evil Cold Open, Asian American Doll, Christmas Serial, Girlfriends Talks Show, Office Christmas Party, Weekend Update (feat. Kim Jong Un, Willie, and Garth and Kat), A Very Cuban Christmas, Singing Sisters and Cat Rescue Commercial. Check out these selected sketches and segments from each of this season's episodes, so you can make every night a Saturday Night.

Dana Carvey/Linkin Park

Sketches include Wayne's World Cold Open featuring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey Monologue, Sleepmate Pro, Church Chat featuring Justin Bieber, Teen Crisis Hotline, The Roommate featuring Justin Bieber, Weekend Update (including Paul as James Franco; Kristen as Disco Queen Meteorologist Angela Dixon), Pageant Preview, Bad News Commercial, and Sports Bar. America's premiere sketch-comedy show returns for its 36th season LIVE from Studio 8H in New York City. Â This season, the cast includes Fred Armisen, Abby Elliott, Bill Hader, Seth Meyers, Bobby Moynihan, Andy Samberg, Jason Sudeikis, Kenan Thompson, Kristen Wiig, featuring Vanessa Bayer, Paul Brittain, Taran Killam, Nasim Pedrad, and Jay Pharoah. Â Check out these selected sketches and segments from each of this season's episodes, so you can make every night a Saturday Night.

Episode 19

View selected sketches and segments from the 1997 episode hosted by Golden Globe winning actor John Goodman with a special guest appearance by Mike Myers. Sketches include: "Oprah", "Jeopardy!", "Talkin with Suel", "Brasky's Buddies at Little League", and "Weekend Update". For clearances reasons, episodes have been edited from their original version.
